gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.resource
Class FqcnStringResourceLoader

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.resource.FqcnStringResourceLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
StringResourceLoader
public class FqcnStringResourceLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements StringResourceLoader

Loads resources based on the component class name. The resource is queried from resource bundles that exist on the component's class package and have the same name with the component's class.
Priority is given to resource bundles of components that are higher in the GUI hierarchy. This allows the author of a component to set default values for the resource keys, but a developer re-using this component in another application to override the values of these resource keys in the resource bundle of any container that encloses this component.
